segments.text: How do you want your hair cut ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want it the way Peckham wears it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding me ? Even the girls know Peckham . Whatever , I have a picture of him here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are a big fan of him ! He has strong legs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , he is a soccer star .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , wake up . It's done . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God . It's disaster . It makes my head look like a soccer ball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like the hairstyle of Kahn who stands beside him in the picture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I made a mistake . I thought the guy on the right was Peckham .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He plays outside right but it doesn't mean he has to stand on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , but do not worry . I think I can fix it . Just cut a little more off the temple .
segments.speaker: S1
